page.title: 13A 10 YEAR OLD GIRL WRITES
page.content: Most school days I get up at 7.3O,wash and put on my school uniform of green skirt & jumper,white blouse with green & yellow striped tie.For breakfast I usually have cereal & toast then go to the bus stop.The school bus arrives at 8.20. The old school bell rings at 9am and there is a daily assembly. We do mathematics until 10.40 playtime.Next there is an hour of English until lunch.Dinners are cooked at the school & cost 65p. In the afternoon we do things like art drama,games,environmental studies. School finishes at 3.30.I might join in out of school activities -badminton netball,cross country running. If not, I get the school bus home at 3.50. When home,I change out of school clothes and play on my bike with my friends until tea time at about 6pm.I read,do homework or watch T.V.at night
